name: Steady As She Goes
description:
A hectic management sim inspired by the likes of Star Trek: TOS and management sims.

Manage a team and a starship as your captain flies himself headfirst into the worst danger you could possibly imagine.

More to come,,, maybe?

Known bugs:

- Game will catch sometimes when moving between Assign and Route panels. No idea why this happens, and might just be on my end.
